commit message: Moving help to bottom of menu
Some UTF-8 text with full-width characters.

fix The cursor can not enclose wide character

(Manually merged from maoabc / Android-Terminal-Emulator)

Make cursor compatible with hardware graphics.

The PixelXorXfermode that we had previously been using is not compatible
with hardware rendering.

Now we draw an off-screen alpha mask that's the desired shape, and
use that to draw the cursor on screen.
Fix cursor rendering for wide characters.
